name: Riddles Cocktail
description:
Five types of riddles in a one game:
--------------------------------
1. Whats the Sound
2. 4 Pics 1 Word
3. Written Riddles
4. Pic Combo
5. Zoomed in Picture
--------------------------------
-Suitable for all ages.
-Great challenging puzzles.
-Leaderboards for global,country and friends.
-Smooth Design and Animations.
--------------------------------
if you love brainteasers,puzzles,riddles this game is definitely for you!!
